title: Daily missions stuck for the past week
body: My daily missions havent refreshed in like a week. I finished my last mission like a week ago and when i logged in the day after i didnt get any new missions. i havent gotten a new mission in a week....

replies.body: The Versus event is over, so no missions are currently enabled.  Per our [missions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008256847-Introducing-Missions), though, our devs aim for missions to make a come back!  Keep updated at our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for updates!
